member.summary: The key will be stored here

member.summary: If the key is to be encrypted, enter a password here.

member.summary: This function will generate a key.

member.name: M:CodeHammer.Generate.doKey(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: Lock a serial key to a specific machine, given its "machine code". Should be 5 digits long.

member.name: M:CodeHammer.Generate.doKey(System.Int32,System.DateTime,System.Int32)
member.summary: This function will generate a key. You may also change the creation date.
member.param: Change the creation date of a key.
Lock a serial key to a specific machine, given its "machine code". Should be 5 digits long.

member.name: P:CodeHammer.Validate.Key
member.summary: Enter a key here before validating.

member.name: P:CodeHammer.Validate.secretPhase
member.summary: If the key has been encrypted, when it was generated, please set the same secretPhase here.

member.name: P:CodeHammer.Validate.IsValid
member.summary: Checks whether the key has been modified or not. If the key has been modified - returns false; if the key has not been modified - returns true.

member.name: P:CodeHammer.Validate.IsExpired
member.summary: If the key has expired - returns true; if the key has not expired - returns false.

member.name: P:CodeHammer.Validate.CreationDate
member.summary: Returns the creation date of the key.

member.name: P:CodeHammer.Validate.DaysLeft
member.summary: Returns the amount of days the key will be valid.

member.name: P:CodeHammer.Validate.SetTime
member.summary: Returns the actual amount of days that were set when the key was generated.

member.name: P:CodeHammer.Validate.ExpireDate
member.summary: Returns the date when the key is to be expired.

member.name: P:CodeHammer.Validate.Features
member.summary: Returns all 8 features in a boolean array

member.name: P:CodeHammer.Validate.IsOnRightMachine
member.summary: If the current machine's machine code is equal to the one that this key is designed for, return true.
